name: OpenPAT Report
summary: Report created by OpenPAT (Open Performance Analysis Toolkit) tools, a cross-platform program analysis toolkit that helps identify hotspots, bottlenecks, buffer overflows, and other data and control flow information; contains a report of an instrumented program to show an analysis to the user; stores information, depending on the tool it's generated from, such as hotspot , coverage , or control_flow .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
